mission.title: Mission
mission.content: Our mission is to optimize the management of technical files in civil works through technological solutions that enhance accuracy, reduce errors, and facilitate seamless collaboration between contractors and specialists.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: To be the most trusted platform for small businesses and independent contractors, reaching 3% of the market in Lima in three years and leading the digitalization of construction processes in the country.

clarity.title: Clarity
clarity.content: We promote transparent and well-structured processes that allows for unambiguous technical planning.

efficiency.title: Efficiency
efficiency.content: We optimize time and resources through technological tools that simplify complex tasks.

confidence.title: Confidence
confidence.content: We build strong relationships with our users by offering reliable solutions that minimize errors and improve decision-making.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This document establishes the terms and conditions of use for ClearCost, developed by the GreatBuild team. By accessing and using this platform, you agree to be bound by these terms.

use-of-the-service.title: Use of the Service
use-of-the-service.content: The user agrees to make responsible and ethical use of the platform, respecting the features offered and avoiding misuse.

user-responsibility.title: User Responsability
user-responsibility.content: The user is responsible for the accuracy of the data they provide and for the proper use of the platform.

responsibility-of-the-development-team.title: Responsibility of the Development Team
responsibility-of-the-development-team.content: The team is committed to ensuring the software runs smoothly, performing ongoing maintenance, and acting professionally and ethically throughout all stages of development.

privacy-and-data-protection.title: Privacy and Data Protection
privacy-and-data-protection.content: The confidentiality and security of the user's personal data is guaranteed, and it will not be shared with third parties without consent. Privacy by design principles and compliance with current regulations are adhered to.

intellectual-property.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual-property.content: All design, development, and content rights belong to the development team unless otherwise stated.

ethical-and-professional-principles.title: Ethical and Professional Principles
ethical-and-professional-principles.content:
Our team adheres to the ACM/IEEE Code of Professional Ethics and the College of Engineers of Peru (CIP). We promote:
Transparency in software engineering.
Commitment to quality, equity, and accessibility.
Respect for the rights of users and society.
